values:
Women are like apples on trees.
 The best ones are at the top of the tree.
 
 Most men don't want to reach for the good ones
 because they are afraid of falling and getting hurt.
 
 Instead, they just get the rotten apples from the
 ground that aren't as good, but easy.......
 
 So the apples at the top think something is wrong
 with them, when in reality, they're amazing.
 
 They just have to wait for the right man to come
 along, the one who's brave enough to climb all the
 way to the top of the tree.

*got violently ill

*feels better

*went to bed

GREEN DAY
"Good Riddance (Time Of Your Life)"

Another turning point, a fork stuck in the road.
Time grabs you by the wrist, directs you where to go.
So make the best of this test, and don't ask why.
It's not a question, but a lesson learned in time.

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right.
I hope you had the time of your life.

So take the photographs, and still frames in your mind.
Hang it on a shelf in good health and good time.
Tattoos of memories and dead skin on trial.
For what it's worth, it was worth all the while.

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right.
I hope you had the time of your life.

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right.
I hope you had the time of your life.

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right.
I hope you had the time of your life.

yay for pretty new glasses though. im seriously thinking about getting light pink frames...how cute would that be? i know..super cute!

lata.

Quiet Emotions

So now we've gone our separate ways
each with different lives to live.

The bond will always be there
the friendship always intact;
But the time for us has come and gone
and the pages of time, you can't turn back.

I will always be a friend to you
and wonder how you are;
The smiles and laughter I will remember
and our fights have become painless scars.

Sometimes on those busy days
when you've a thousand things to do;
Please let me glide slowly through your mind
and spend some time with you.

In that quiet moment
when you're surprised to find me there;
Just remember even with the distance between us
I am still someone who cares.

<MARQUEE>HAPPY 16TH BIRTHDAY TO NATALIE BACKORA!!!!!</MARQUEE>



i love you natz!!!! i hope you have an AWESOME birfday and i hope you liked our voice mails!!!  your real birfday present will be given to you on the 21st at our CHICAS NIGHT OUT/ CHICAS SLEEPOVER!!!!  weeee!!!



I WUV YOU!!!!!

my aunt died.
and i can't even go to her funeral.

Shoot me. shoot me now.


its Baylor time.

so yeah. today is my birthday. horay!!! 17!!!
went yesterday to get my drivers liscense and my picture isn't as good as my learners permit was, but its ok. 

nicole got me a fishie!!!!! its soo cute. its like a purpleish pink color and i named her bubbles.  my sister wrapped my locker with pink paper and a pink flower with ribbons. plus she got me like this notepad in the shap of an 'm' and she got me this cute little pink elephant and a pad of stickers! yay! man this day is getting better and better :D
sarah got me this card that almost made me cry b/c lately ive just been super down b/c i feel like im not a very good friend, and the card was just sooo sweet.  

oh yeah, you guys all have to sign my poster thats hanging on that pillar in the jr/sr locker area. im not sure where im going to put it yet, but sign it anyway!!!!

<marquee>HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME!!</MARQUEE>

wow. today was busy.

this morning i had drivers ed once again. yep. fun stuff. then during first period i drove with mr. b for the first time. yep. we were gonna drive around the parking lot, but then he goes, " i have confidence in you driving, go ahead and pull out on 56th" so i do that, but on the way around the corner, what do i do? yep, i run over the curb and right into the snow bank. i was like, well the confidence just flew out the window, but the rest of the drive went fairly good.

i am pretty sure that the english test was a touch harder than expected, but the us history test was somewhat of a breeze for me, which is good. i studied hard for that little mother.

                                           


so lately ive been kinda worried about the next tec. first i wasn't for sure if i could go or not b/c i didn't know if my mom wanted me to go at all, so i kinda just layed low. but now i guess she's letting me go for my birthday, so that makes me happy, but the thing is is that i dont know if im going to get on the team that i want to be on. that would kind of suck, but i would still get stuff out of it wouldn't i? i hope so. but really i should just give it up to God. he will do what he see's fit. i just hope theres still room for me to work. *prays super hard* . i guess the whole reason for me even bringing this up, is that i was wondering if  you guys could pray for me. that the right opportunities come up if it be his will. please pray...even if you have never been to tec, or even if you have. just pray. thanks.

after school dayna and i went tanning. i decided to go for 15 minutes this time. that was WAY too long. yep im burnt and i think i burnt my ears too..ouch!

i think im gonna go to bed because we have a showchoir competition tomorrow and i have to be at school at seven to do amanda's hair and makeup. but yeah. also i need to go clean out my closet....its in grave need of cleaning. yes i think i shall do that. get rid of some stuff.

goodnight all :D

my computer is so stupid. everytime i click on my friends page, it goes to entries from like two weeks ago. grrr...stupid computer.

if anybody knows how to fix this quite large problem, let me know!!!

mindy :D

Look at this picture and tell me he's not hot...

I'll know your lying.

1. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it. 
2. Am I loveable? 
3. How long have you known me? 
4. When and how did we first meet? 
5. What was your first impression? 
6. Do you still think that way about me now? 
7. What do you think my weakness is? 
8. Do you think I'll get married? 
9. What makes me happy? 
10. What makes me sad? 
11. What reminds you of me? 
12. If you could give me anything what would it be? 
13. How well do you know me? 
14. When's the last time you saw me? 
15. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't? 
16. Do you think I could kill someone? 
17. Describe me in one word. 
18. Do you think our friendship is getting stronger/weaker/or staying the same? 
19. Do you feel that you could talk to me about anything and I would listen? 
20. Are you going to put this on your livejournal and see what I say about you?

You have a mysterious kiss. Your partner never
knows what you're going to come up with next;
this creates great excitement and arousal never
knowing what to expect. And it's sure to end
in a kiss as great as your mystery.

What kind of kiss are you?
brought to you by Quizilla

Hands and Feet An image flashed across my TV screen Another broken heart comes in to view I saw the pain and I turned my back Why can't I do the things I want to? I'm willing yet I'm so afraid You give me strength When I say I want to be Your hands I want to be Your feet I'll go where You send me I'll go where You send me And I'll try, yeah I'll try To touch the world like You touched my life And I find my way To be Your hands I've abandoned every selfish thought I've surrendered everything I've got You can have everything I am And perfect everything I'm not I'm willing, I'm not afraid You give me strength When I say This is the last time I turned my back on You From now on, I'll go so Send me where You want me to I finally have a mission I promise I'll complete I don't need excuses When I am Your hands and feet

yesterday was interesting. i got absolutely nothing done except for cleaning...everyting...it sucked man.
today was so freakin busy. i had my meeting till 5:30 then i went shopping for a while and ended up coming home. so i still havn't done any of my homework and probably wont. so yeah. i hope everybody's weekend went as good as mine...sense the sarcasm...
oh yeah, at my meeting i met this guy named bill and he was hitting on me and it was kinda funny b/c noboby hits on me except for gross guys....
oh, and stephanie made a metaphore about god and constipation..man that was soooo funny. 
anywho, i guess ill see ya all on the flip side..ive always wanted to say that.
justin wants me to show him what this is all about

okay so i was trying to call some people and find out if they wanted to do anything today considering that we dont have school, but like always, they already have plans that they already made with better people. so that sucks. i guess ill just hang out with nikki when she gets off work which wont be till atleast 6:30. oh well, atleast she wants to hang out. 
i went to my cousins yesterday thinking that i'd be home around 7ish. then i was going to go spend the night at emmas but sweet how i didnt get home til 3 in the morning. yeah, that sucked. then i didn't get to go shopping with them for a homecomming dress which just proves that i shouldn't go anyway. 
well i hope all you guys are having fun with your "friends"

so yesterday was possibly one of the scarriest days of my life. so after school i said that i would hang out with robby and cruise "A" with him so i did. then i had told emma that we would go and see her at runza. but on the way there, i asked if we could stop at my house to get me some money (cuz it was my turn to pay.lol.)and i wanted a jacket, so we turned right on to 33rd street and this guy ran a red light and ran into the back of robbys car. im not even joking you. so i didn't get to see my emzy, and i got some major bruises on my ribs. and my neck kinda hurt a lil too. but the scarry thing about the whole thing is that robby didn't really feel like driving that night, so he asked if i wanted too, and i almost said yes, but i decided against it....so that could have easily been me and i would have been in soo much trouble. im just glad im alive. yes, it was that bad. i think it was a God thing, but u never know. 
so today i went shopping with all my relatives and it was fun... i guess. and i got a new purse!! yay!! its pink with pineapples, and jewels and stuff on it. its the cutest purse i own...almost as cute as my black one with the words. but yeah. so emma just called and wanted me to go to a movie with her but my parents are super gay and wont let me go to a 9:30 showing...how stupid is that? but i might just spend the night at her house tomorrow.. we'll see. so that was my day. i hope urs was good. i get to go hold my new baby cousin vanessa now..yay!!! 
MiNdElA

so, pretty sure that this week sucked. last night at showchoir was the worst because i flipped out at everybody b/c i couldn't fit into some stupid dress and then carissa had to peek over the stall and laugh at me...yeah. thats right, i said laughed. seriously thinking about shooting myself. im so tired of looking at myself. i disgust me. im so f-in fat its rediculous. no matter how hard i try to change it, nothing works. why do i all of a sudden feel this way? i hate it. hopefully this weekend will be better.don't post anything to this entry b/c i know u all think that im fishing for compliments or whatever...yeah...thats it i guess. im gonna go cry.

Same old thing
every day
wake up early
and begin to think
what the hell is wrong with me?
why am i the way i am?
how can i change me for the better?
so i dont look in the mirrow 
and see the same ugly girl
looking back
i want to be perfect
thats all there is to it
i need to be the thinnest
and i wish to be the prettiest
but no matter how many days i go without food
or how many times i get my hair changed
my makeup done
new stylin' clothes
im still going to be 
that same ugly girl
who wishes to live in a perfect world
where everything about her
is so gorgeous
and where her thoughts inside her
are ones she could share
i have been lost long ago
and things just seem dark
i don't understand what to do with myself
im torn between past, future, and reality
where to go and what to know
how to see what you all do
i have to keep going
im sorry for this
i really can't stop fo all of you
i must know what i can achieve
how far are my limits?
and what do i need.
its alright
please understand
im gonna be okay once i get to the end....

hmm..where to start. today was okay i guess. im super nervous about  the algebra quiz next period b/c i didn't really study for it and i didn't really understand it all that well either. oh well, thats what i get for having way too much fun yesterday. then after i went to bed i realized that i had forgotten my pcl homework at school which totally sucked b/c i hadn't stated it and i have that period 2. so my morning sucked. but it slowly got better b/c i found out that alternative tan has this deal where if your a new member you can tan for 3 dollars 3 times. so that rox. so thats what im doing after school. me and nicz, and surz, and currie are gonna go. its gonna be a blast!!  so then i went to english class and i was so excited b/c i got to color!!! yay! so i better go b/c the bells gonna ring soon.
MiNdElA

SO RIGHT AT THIS VERY MOMENT, IM HEARING THE STACY'S MOM SONG FOR THE VERY FIRST TIME!!! AHHHH!! HOW SERIOUSLY HILLARIOUS!!! BAH!!! IVE NEVER HEARD ANYTHING MORE FUNNY IN MY LIFE!!! IN THE WORDS OF CARRIE: "THE CAPS LOCK BUTTON IS STILL ON!!!!" AHHH!! STILL LAUGHING ABOUT THE WHOLE STACYS MOM THING!!! AHHHAAA!!!
so i just looked up the word "exanimate" and it said that it means "bloated emotionally" lol!!! i thought it was the funniest thing ever!!! sorry, thought i'd share that little tid bit with ya!

so today was like the best day ever!!! currie and i after school said we were gonna hang out, so we went to her house, then to the mall to pick out some perfumes from victorias secret and i got jennifer this gift set of body splash, body wash, and lotion, for her birthday, and then i got me the same stuff too b/c i thought that it smelled so good. so if you see me tomorrow, ask if you can smell me, and ill let you smell it b/c its the best smell ever!!! its of course the pink stuff..i think its called secret crush...i could be wrong of course. but anywho, after that we went to some drug store and got her some birthday balloons. okay, funny story about those balloons: carrie and i were like, "so where are we gonna put the balloons since they would be an obstruction of my vision in the back seat?" so me, being a genious and all was like,"hmm...how bout we stick them in the trunk?" and currie being smart and was like, "wont they break" "no, they wont..." so what do we do? thats right...im stupid and stick them in the trunk and not even a mile from the drugstore, we hear this faint pop and it scurred currie, but i was like, "yeah, pretty sure that was a balloon. so that kinda sucked but then we decided to "change the color of our skin"(haha amanda!!!!) and so we went tanning. i seriously think i got burnt. like u can't really tell by looking, but i can tell b/c my arms are hot. like not oh, its hot in here hot, but hot...ya know? okay, atleast i do. but so then we went to the grocery store and ended up picking up stuff to make puppy chow for our careers class and then we went back to curries house and made it, and then we fixed my journal so that it looked even prettier than before and then we went to jennifers party and it was a BLAST!!!! so that was my night in the form of a super long run on sentence!!! yay!!! so all-in-all i had an awesome, awesome, AWESOME night!! MiNdElA oh yeah...casey just called AGAIN...bah!! damn you casey!!!

yeah now im thinking that i really dont care to go to homecomming. who cares? seriously though. its totally over rated and plus its not like its senior prom or anything big like that. oh well. so on to bigger and brighter topics!!! currie is helping me with my journal to make it all pretty. she's so smart! tomorrows jennifers birthday!!! go cheerleader jennifer!!! you know what im sick of. im sick of casey thinking that he can control me. that part of my life is in the past and he is in the past. he will never be in my future, so why doesn't he just stop calling?! seriously. it makes me sooo mad. all he does is put me down and ask why our so-called "relationship" didn't work out. im tired of it all... im tired of him... im tired of being everybody's rug to step on. guys, seriously..what should i do? i dont know what to do about him. everytime he calls i cringe, and i just wish that he would go away. he's in college for christ's sake. get a f-in girlfriend. leave me alone. so yeah, that was mindy's bitchyness at its best. sorry about that guys. MiNdElLa

okay, so Emma and Currie and me are in health and careers and were suppose to be doing this stupid worksheet, but of course were not. so i feel bad for my emzy...b/c she just checked jesse's email and there was another email from snapple...damn her!!!!  so the bell just rang, so i  better head out man!
MiNdElA

i was listening to the radio up in my room, and this song came on, and i was like...wow...that soo pertains to a ton of stuff thats happened in the past, and present..so yeah check it out! its the best song ever.

<lj-cut>MY FAVORITE MISTAKE

I woke up and called this morning
The tone of your voice was a warning
That you don't care for me anymore

I made up the bed we sleep in
I looked at the clock when you creep in
It's 6 a.m. and I'm alone

Did you know when you go
It's the perfect ending
To the bad day I was just beginning
When you go all I know is
You're my favorite mistake

Well, your friends are sorry for me
They watch you pretend to adore me
But I'm no fool to this game

Now here comes your secret lover
She'd be unlike any other
Until your guilt goes up in flames

Did you know when you go
It's the perfect ending
To the bad day I've gotten used to spending
When you go all I know is
You're my favorite mistake
You're my favorite mistake

Well maybe nothin' lasts forever
Even when you stay together
I don't need forever after
It's your laughter won't let me go
So I'm holding on this way

Did you know, could you tell
You were the only one 
That I ever loved
Now everything's so wrong

Did you see me walking by?
Did it ever make you cry?

You're my favorite mistake
You're my favorite mistake
You're my favorite mistake </lj-cut>

okay, so i went to the football game today and it kinda sucked because nobody came except for the people who were marching band..blah...so yeah, that was a blast. and i guess that nikki was suppose to come hang out with me, but sweet how she never showed up. yeah i love it when your "friends" ditch you when your weekend already sucked. On top of that some people were going to amandas house to watch the game and of course i couldn't go b/c my parents were being stupid and decided that we were gonna go see my new cousin instead. which is cool i guess... if they would have let me know before hand so i wouldn't get my hopes up with hanging out with some friends this weekend. yeah..that was my day. pretty shitty huh. 
so this whole nikki thing has gotten me in a pretty bad mood. maybe im just overreacting but seriously, if your gonna say that your gonna hang out with somebody, HANG OUT WITH THEM! dont flake and then decide not to call. yeah that was really cool of her. let me just say that it really made my day.
